responsibilities.content: Designed and developed low-code business applications using Power Apps, streamlining internal workflows and improving data accessibility.
Created complex automated workflows using Power Automate, integrating internal systems and enhancing operational efficiency.
Developed interactive reports and dashboards using Power BI to support data-driven decision-making across departments.
Deployed and managed Power Platform solutions using deployment pipelines for version control, ALM, and environment management, adhering to the SDLC process.
Integrated Power Apps and Power Automate with third-party APIs, Microsoft Graph, and external services to extend functionality and streamline cross-platform processes.
Managed and administered SharePoint sites as backend storage for Power Platform solutions, optimizing list design, permissions, and collaboration workflows.
Utilized Azure services, including Azure Logic Apps, API Management, and Azure Functions, to enhance scalability and maintainability of Power Platform applications.
Implemented and maintained API integrations, ensuring secure and efficient communication between business systems.
Integrated AI models into Power Apps and Power Automate solutions, enabling intelligent automation, form recognition, and data prediction features.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to analyze requirements, design technical solutions, and deliver end-to-end business automation systems aligned with organizational goals.
Designed and developed multiple in-house and corporate web applications using Power Applications, Power Automate, and Dataverse to streamline business processes and improve efficiency.
Experienced in managing and maintaining SharePoint sites for document storage, team collaboration, and workflow automation.
Managed and maintained IT hardware, software, and network equipment for the organization.
Configured and deployed Fortinet Firewalls and Synology Drive for secure and efficient network storage solutions.
Automated critical tasks using Power Automate, such as integrating daily attendance records (from ZKTeco Biometrics) directly into the payroll system database.
Created monthly assessment reports detailing hardware, software, and network performance improvements.
Advanced knowledge of Fortinet Firewall and Synology Network Storage.

Extensive experience in managing Office 365 environments, including Domain integration and configuration, Security Groups and Distribution List management, Email flow and rule setup using Microsoft Exchange.
Assisted in troubleshooting and resolving hardware, software, and network-related issues for internal users.
Provided technical support for the installation, configuration, and maintenance of IT equipment and applications.
Monitored and maintained network infrastructure to ensure minimal downtime and optimal performance.
Performed routine diagnostics and maintenance tasks on computer systems and peripherals.
Documented technical issues and resolutions, contributing to a knowledge base for future troubleshooting.
Collaborated with senior engineers to learn and implement advanced IT solutions.
